inclusion.criterion: Barcelona Clinic Liver Cancer stage C or stage B if you cannot tolerate or failed TACE
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: diagnosis by observation of segmented fungal hyphae during a microscopic KOH wet mount examination

inclusion.criterion: No cirrhosis or Child-Pugh A cirrhosis
inclusion.label: unknown
met
inclusion.evidence: physical exam and lab studies were normal otherwise

inclusion.criterion: All acute toxic effects of any prior treatment have resolved to NCI-CTCAE v4.0 grade 1 or less
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Able to swallow and retain oral medication
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Clinically apparent central nervous system metastases or carcinomatous meningitis
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: physical exam and lab studies were normal otherwise

notes: Patient has a history of hyperlipidemia in her mother and MI in her father, but no underlying disease such as DM. He smokes 15 cigarettes per day and drinks a beer per day.
